slra.simObjects.utilities

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • slra.simObjects.utilities.Material

  • public class Material
extends java.lang.Object
    This Class represents an instantiation of a SimObject's material. Material defines the color, texture, and light reflection properties of an object.
    Author:
    Henry Valentine

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Vector3f color 
      private float specularIntensity 
      private float specularPower 
      private Texture texture 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Material()
      Default Material Creates new Material Object With default specular Intensity and Power, default base color, and default texture
      Material(Texture texture)
      Creates new Material Object With default specular Intensity and Power and default Base Color
      Material(Texture texture, Vector3f color)
      Creates new Material Object With default specular Intensity and Power
      Material(Texture texture, Vector3f color, float specularIntensity, float specularPower)
      Primary Constructor Creates new Material Object
      Material(Vector3f color)
      Creates new Material Object With default specular Intensity and Power and default Texture

        specularPower - : Reflection Width
